post:
Hello Everyone,

We'd like to introduce a perfect line up of [Virtual Servers](http://www.RobustVPS.net) suited for everyone specific needs.

All Current VPS offerings are based in Phoenix, Arizona USA - We're awaiting on new stock for The Netherlands.


**RobustVPS Facts:**
**+** Instant Deployment upon order completion!
**+**  Intel Xeon Quad-core Processors
**+** RAID-10 Array Storage (Western Digital HDD's)
**+** 1Gbit Connection to each node
**+** 1Gbit Unmetered is Available on Selected plans (Counting inbound as unmetered BW) 
**+** 24x7 Level 1 to Level 2 Support - Level 3 from 8am - 7pm GMT (Monday to Friday)
**+** SolusVM VPS Control panel to manage your VPS 
**+** 99.9% Network uptime Guarantee
**+** Utilizing OpenVZ Technology


**Low End Promotion:**
 We're offering 25% off + Unmetered 1 Gbps inbound traffic on all VPS Plans to all LEW/LET members/guests!
Use promo code*: LE25




-\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\- **512MB VPS PACKAGE** -/////////////-
**+** 35GB RAID-10 Storage **(SATA)**
**+** 512MB RAM - 1024MB BURST
**+** 1 IPv4 Address (Upto 15 with good reason
**+** 1Gbps Unmetered Inbound Traffic _- 1TB Outband
**+** OpenVZ & SolusVM Control Panel
Price per month: £4.40GBP  // $6.90 USD  **<<<--- 25% Recurring discount!**
Promo code to get discount: **_LE25_**
http://www.robustvps.net/c/cart.php?gid=5

**+** Hacking
